home.summary: The primary purpose of my supper club is to create a unique, intimate, and social dining experience, centered around high-quality food and meaningful conversation. It aims to foster a sense of community and connection among guests, encouraging interaction and engagement throughout the evening.

mainCourse.name: Enchiladas
mainCourse.description: Rolled tortillas filled with vegies and cheese, topped with Ba's signature sauce

mainCourse.name: Mexican Rice and Beans
mainCourse.description: Authentic Mexican rice served with seasoned black beans, fresh guacamole, sour cream, and various homemade salsas

desserts.name: Churros
desserts.description: Golden fried dough sticks rolled in cinnamon sugar, served with chocolate dipping sauce

reviews.name: Priya Sharma
reviews.content: Ba's kitchen feels like home away from home. The warmth, the flavors, and Ba's personal touch make every meal special. It's like being invited to a dear friend's family dinner.

reviews.name: Rajesh Patel
reviews.content: I've never experienced such authentic, home-style cooking in a restaurant setting. Ba treats every guest like family, and you can taste the love in every dish.

reviews.name: Meera Joshi
reviews.content: Ba's Kitchen has brought something truly special to Jamnagar. The intimate setting and Ba's personal care make you feel like you're dining at your grandmother's house.

gallery.name: First Mexican Night
gallery.description: Ba's inaugural Mexican cuisine evening featuring authentic enchiladas and warm hospitality. Guests were delighted by the authentic flavors and intimate settings

gallery.name: Valentine's Special
gallery.description: A romantic evening with couples enjoying Ba's special Italian menu. The intimate candlelit setting created perfect moments for our guests.

gallery.name: Family Gathering
gallery.description: Three generations came together for Ba's traditional Gujarati thali. The warmth of home-cooked food brought smiles to every face.

gallery.name: Birthday Celebration
gallery.description: A surprise birthday dinner featuring Ba's signature continental dishes. The birthday guest was moved to tears by the thoughtful presentation.

gallery.name: Wine Pairing Evening
gallery.description: An elegant French cuisine night with carefully selected wine pairings. Guests learned about flavor combinations while enjoying Ba's culinary artistry.
